forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High around 60F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low near 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 53F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.
